message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.NA, cs.SY 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CG (Computational Geometry) - Computational topology is closely related to computational geometry, as it involves the study of geometric structures and their computational properties. 
2. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - Computational topology involves the development of algorithms and data structures for analyzing and manipulating topological structures. 
3. cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory) - Topology has applications in game theory, and computational topology can be used to analyze game-theoretic problems. 
4. cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) - Computational topology involves the use of numerical methods for solving topological problems. 
5. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - Topology has applications in control theory, and computational topology can be used to analyze control systems.
